paragraphs.body: It is a widely accepted standard that should normally be followed by all editors.

paragraphs.body: The channel for Avatar Wiki on the freenode network is #wikia-avatar. You can find help from an ${link_0} here or you can just chat with other Avatar Wikians from our diverse community.
paragraphs.text: The channel for Avatar Wiki on the freenode network is #wikia-avatar. You can find help from an administrator here or you can just chat with other Avatar Wikians from our diverse community.

paragraphs.body: That's it! Other than common sense, there are no other restrictions, including on topics of discussion or on the right of users to keep and post logs and transcripts of what has been said on the channel. Users may talk about any subject in any way they wish if no user participating on the channel at the time indicates, with justifiable reasoning, that they are uncomfortable with the subject or the language being utilized.
paragraphs.text: That's it! Other than common sense, there are no other restrictions, including on topics of discussion or on the right of users to keep and post logs and transcripts of what has been said on the channel. Users may talk about any subject in any way they wish if no user participating on the channel at the time indicates, with justifiable reasoning, that they are uncomfortable with the subject or the language being utilized.

paragraphs.body: If a user is found to consistently disregard channel rules, the user will be warned on the channel, and continued unacceptable behavior will result in the user being kicked or temporarily banned from the channel.
paragraphs.text: If a user is found to consistently disregard channel rules, the user will be warned on the channel, and continued unacceptable behavior will result in the user being kicked or temporarily banned from the channel.

paragraphs.body: When a user is blocked on Avatar Wiki that automatically means a block on IRC for the same duration of the wiki block.
paragraphs.text: When a user is blocked on Avatar Wiki that automatically means a block on IRC for the same duration of the wiki block.
